statements: DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count > 100 AND average_speed < 60;
DELETE FROM city_population WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND population < 1000000;
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Highway 101' AND date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE street_name = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM city_infrastructure WHERE street_name = 'Broadway' AND road_condition = 'Poor';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-10-10' AND street_name = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM city_infrastructure WHERE street_name = 'Broadway' AND road_condition = 'Wet';
DELETE FROM RoadConditions WHERE condition = 'Heavy Traffic';
